string: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your camera to take photos of your clothing items and add them to your virtual closet. For example, snap a picture of your new jacket and save it in the app.
Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your microphone to enable voice commands for easier navigation.
Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to save photos to your library for a seamless experience. For instance, when you create a new item, the app can save it to your closet.
Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your photos to import clothing items into your virtual closet. For example, select photos of clothes from your library to add them to the app.
